feedback: This product is not appropriate for you because it is a processed snack that is high in sodium and carbohydrates and contains gluten. It does not align with your goals of eating healthier, losing weight, and reducing sugar intake. It is also not gluten-free, which you requested.

ingredients.description: Enriched flour is a processed ingredient that may lack some of the nutrients found in whole grains.
Cheddar cheese is a source of calcium and protein, but it can also be high in fat and sodium.
Vegetable oils can be a source of healthy fats, but some types may be highly processed.
Salt is used for flavoring, but excessive intake can contribute to high blood pressure.
Yeast extract is a flavor enhancer that can add umami to the crackers.
Paprika extract is used for coloring and can provide some antioxidants.
Spices add flavor and may have some health benefits.
Dehydrated onions add flavor and can provide some nutrients.
Annatto extract is used for coloring.
Turmeric extract is used for coloring and has anti-inflammatory properties.
Leavening agents help the crackers rise and become crispy.
